TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract DataLabel

summary.span: 代表图表数据点或趋势线上的数据标签。

span.span: Represents the data label on a chart point or trendline.

para.span: 在一个系列上, 该对象是集合的一个成员。

span.span: On a series, the object is a member of the collection.

para.span: 集合包含每个点的对象。

span.span: The collection contains a object for each point.

para.span: 对于没有可定义点 (如区域系列) 的系列, 该集合包含单个对象。

span.span: For a series without definable points (such as an area series), the collection contains a single object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Application As Object
public: property System::Object ^ Application { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在不使用对象识别符的情况下使用时 , 此属性返回一个代表 Microsoft Word 应用程序的对象。

span.span: When used without an object qualifier, this property returns an object that represents the Microsoft Word application.

summary.span: 如果与对象识别符一起使用，则此属性返回代表指定对象的创建者的 Application 对象（可以将此属性与 OLE 自动化对象一起使用以返回该对象的应用程序）。

span.span: When used with an object qualifier, this property returns an Application object that represents the creator of the specified object (you can use this property with an OLE Automation object to return the application of that object).

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ AutoScaleFont { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 如果对象大小更改时，对象内部的文本相应地更改字体大小，则该属性值为 True。

span.span: True if the text in the object changes font size when the object size changes.

summary.span: 默认值为 True。

span.span: The default value is True.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoText { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果对象会根据内容自动生成合适的文字，则该属性值为 True 。

span.span: True if the object automatically generates appropriate text based on context.

summary.span: Boolean 类型，可读写。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Border As ChartBorder

summary.span: 返回一个 object 类型的对象, 该对象代表对象的边框。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the border of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Caption { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 String 值，它代表数据标签文本。

span.span: Returns or sets a String value that represents the data label text.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.ChartCharacters Characters[object Start, object Length] { get; }
Public ReadOnly Property Characters(Optional Start As Object, Optional Length As Object) As ChartCharacters

public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::ChartCharacters ^ Characters[System::Object ^, System::Object ^] { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Word::ChartCharacters ^ get(System::Object ^ Start, System::Object ^ Length); };

param.name: Start
param.span: 要返回的第一个字符。如果此参数是 1 或被省略，则此属性返回一个以第一个字符为开头的字符区域。

span.span: The first character to be returned. If this argument is either 1 or omitted, this property returns a range of characters starting with the first character.

param.name: Length

span.span: The number of characters to be returned.

param.span: 如果省略此参数, 则此属性返回字符串的剩余部分 (字符后面的所有字符)。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, this property returns the remainder of the string (everything after the character).

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示对象文本中的字符范围。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a range of characters within the object text.

summary.span: 您可以使用对象设置文本字符串中字符的格式。

span.span: You can use the object to format characters within a text string.
Returns .

para.span: 对象不是集合。

span.span: The object isn't a collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

summary.span: 只读 Integer。

span.span: Read-only Integer.

para.span: 如果对象是在 Microsoft Word 中创建的, 则该属性返回十六进制数字是 4d535744, 表示字符串 "MSWD"。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Word, the property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD."

para.span: 此属性主要用于在 Macintosh 上，其中每个应用程序都有一个四字符创建者代码中使用。

span.span: This property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Word 提供了 MSWD 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD.

para.span: 有关此属性的其他信息，请参阅语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh 版本所附带的帮助。

span.span: For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Delete() runtime managed

summary.span: 删除对象。

span.span: Deletes the object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Fill As ChartFillFormat

summary.span: 返回指定的形状或对象的对象, 该对象包含形状或图表的填充格式属性指定的图表。

span.span: Returns a object for a specified shape or a object for a specified chart that contains fill formatting properties for the shape or chart.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Font As ChartFont

summary.span: 返回一个对象, 表示指定的对象的字体。

span.span: Returns a object that represents the font of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Format As ChartFormat

summary.span: 返回行、 填充和效果的对象的格式。

span.span: Returns the line, fill, and effect formatting for the object.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Formula { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值, 该值代表使用 A1 样式表示法 (英文) 的对象的公式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the formula of the object using A1-style notation, in English.

value.span: 表示使用 A1 样式表示法的对象的公式 (以英文表示)。

span.span: Represents the formula of the object using A1-style notation, in English.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormulaLocal { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的公式 (使用用户语言的 A1 样式引用)。

span.span: Gets or sets the formula for the object, using A1-style references in the language of the user.

value.span: 对象的公式, 使用用户语言的 A1 样式引用。

span.span: The formula for the object, using A1-style references in the language of the user.

para.span: 读/写字符串。

span.span: Read/write string.

para.span: 如果单元格包含一个常量，此属性返回该常量。

span.span: If the cell contains a constant, this property returns that constant.

para.span: 如果单元格为空，此属性返回一个空字符串。

span.span: If the cell is empty, the property returns an empty string.

para.span: 如果单元格包含公式，此属性将该公式作为字符串返回，所用格式与在编辑栏（包括等号 (=)）中显示时的格式相同。

span.span: If the cell contains a formula, the property returns the formula as a string, in the same format in which it would be displayed in the formula bar (including the equal sign (=)).

para.span: 如果将单元格的值或公式设置为日期，Microsoft Excel 将验证该单元格的格式是否已设置为某个日期或时间数字格式。如果不是，数字格式将更改为默认的短日期数字格式。

span.span: If you set the value or formula of a cell to a date, Microsoft Excel verifies that the cell is already formatted with one of the date or time number formats. If not, the number format is changed to the default short date number format.

para.span: 对多重单元格区域设置公式，则该区域中所有单元格都用此公式填充。

span.span: Setting the formula of a multiple-cell range fills all cells in the range with the formula.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormulaR1C1 { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的公式, 使用宏语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

span.span: Gets or sets the formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the macro.

value.span: 对象的公式, 使用宏语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

span.span: The formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the macro.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FormulaR1C1Local { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的公式, 使用用户语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

span.span: Gets or sets the formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the user.

value.span: 对象的公式, 使用用户语言的 R1C1 样式表示法。

span.span: The formula for the object, using R1C1-style notation in the language of the user.

para.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

summary.span: 获取对象的高度 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Gets the height, in points, of the object.

value.span: 对象的高度，以磅为单位。

span.span: The height, in points, of the object.

para.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ HorizontalAlignment { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个Object值, 它代表指定对象的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Returns or sets a Object value that represents the horizontal alignment for the specified object.

para.span: 此属性的值可设置为其中一个常量。

span.span: The value of this property can be set to one of the constants.

para.span: 注意: 某些常量可能不可用, 具体取决于您选择或安装的语言支持 (例如, 美国英语)。

span.span: Note: some of these constants may not be available to you, depending on the language support (U.S. English, for example) that you've selected or installed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Interior As Interior

summary.span: 返回一个 object 类型的对象, 该对象代表指定对象的内部。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the interior of the specified object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Left { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个Double值, 它代表从对象左边缘到图表区左边缘的距离 (以磅为单位)。

span.span: Returns or sets a Double value that represents the distance, in points, from the left edge of the object to the left edge of the chart area.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 字符串 值，表示该对象的名称。

span.span: Returns a String value that represents the name of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NumberFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 String 值，它代表对象的格式代码。

span.span: Returns or sets a String value that represents the format code for the object.

para.span: 格式代码是在 设置单元格格式对话框中 格式代码选项相同的字符串。

span.span: The format code is the same string as the Format Codes option in the Format Cells dialog box.

para.span: Format函数使用的格式代码字符串与和 属性使用的格式代码字符串不同。

span.span: The Format function uses different format code strings than do the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool NumberFormatLinked { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如此 如果数字格式指向单元格 (以便在单元格更改时，数字格式更改标签中)。读/写 boolean 类型的值 。

span.span: True if the number format is linked to the cells (so that the number format changes in the labels when it changes in the cells). Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ NumberFormatLocal { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个object值, 该值以用户语言的字符串形式表示对象的格式代码。

span.span: Returns or sets an Object value that represents the format code for the object as a string in the language of the user.

para.span: Format函数使用的格式代码字符串与和 属性使用的格式代码字符串不同。

span.span: The Format function uses different format code strings than do the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Orientation { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个Integer值, 它代表文本方向。

span.span: Returns or sets an Integer value that represents the text orientation.

para.span: 此属性的值可以是从–90到90度或其中一个常量的整数值。

span.span: The value of this property can be an integer value from – 90 to 90 degrees or one of the constants.

span.span: Returns or sets a value that represents the position of the data label.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ReadingOrder { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个Integer类型的值, 该值代表指定对象的阅读顺序的一个常量。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Select() runtime managed

summary.span: 选择对象。

span.span: Selects the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Separator { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 设置或返回一个对象, 表示用于图表上的数据标签的分隔符。

span.span: Sets or returns an Object representing the separator used for the data labels on a chart.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

para.span: 如果使用字符串，则会一个字符串作为分隔符。

span.span: If you use a string, you will get a string as the separator.

para.span: 如果使用常量的值 (= 1), 则将根据数据标签获取默认的数据标签分隔符, 该分隔符可以是逗号或换行符。

span.span: If you use the values of the constant (= 1), you will get the default data label separator, which is either a comma or a newline, depending on the data label.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shadow { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，它确定对象是否有阴影。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean value that determines if the object has a shadow.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowBubbleSize { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果设置为True , 则在图表中显示数据标签的气泡大小。

span.span: Set to True to show the bubble size for the data labels on a chart.

summary.span: 如果为 False，则隐藏该分类的名称。

span.span: False to hide.

summary.span: 读/写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowCategoryName { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果设置为True , 则在图表上显示数据标签的类别名称。

span.span: Set to True to display the category name for the data labels on a chart.

summary.span: 如果为 False，则隐藏该分类的名称。

span.span: False to hide.

summary.span: 读/写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowLegendKey { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 如果数据标签图例项标示可见, 则设置为True 。

span.span: Set to True if the data label legend key is visible.

summary.span: 读/写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

para.span: 本示例将活动文档中第一个图表的第一个系列的数据标签设置为显示值和图例项标示。

span.span: This example sets the data labels for series one of the first chart in the active document to show values and the legend key.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowPercentage { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置为True以在图表上显示数据标签的百分比值。

span.span: Set to True to display the percentage value for the data labels on a chart.

summary.span: 如果为 False，则隐藏该分类的名称。

span.span: False to hide.

summary.span: 读/写 Boolean。

span.span: Read/write Boolean.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowRange { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 设置为True , 则在指定的图表数据标签的单元格区域字段中显示值。

span.span: Set to True to display the Value From Cells range field for the specified chart data label.

summary.span: 设置为False以隐藏该字段。

span.span: Set to False to hide that field.

summary.span: 读/写布尔值(在 c # 中为bool )。

span.span: Read/write Boolean (bool in C#).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowSeriesName { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，它指明图表上数据标签的系列名称显示方式。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean to indicate the series name display behavior for the data labels on a chart.

summary.span: 如果为 True，则显示系列名称。

span.span: True to show the series name.

summary.span: 如果为 False，则隐藏数据标签值。

span.span: False to hide.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowValue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Boolean 值，该值对应所指定图表的数据标签值显示方式。

span.span: Returns or sets a Boolean corresponding to a specified chart's data label values display behavior.

summary.span: 如果为 True，则显示数据标签值。

span.span: True displays the values.

summary.span: 如果为 False，则隐藏数据标签值。

span.span: False to hide.

summary.span: 读/写。

span.span: Read/write.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置指定对象中的文本。

span.span: Returns or sets the text for the specified object.

summary.span: String 类型，可读写。

span.span: Read/write String.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Top { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置一个 Double 值，它代表从对象的上边缘到工作表第一行顶部或图表上的图表区顶部的距离（以磅为单位）。

span.span: Returns or sets a Double value that represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of the object to the top of row 1 (on a worksheet) or the top of the chart area (on a chart).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Type { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 返回或设置标签类型。

span.span: Returns or sets the label type.

summary.span: 读取/写入 对象 。

span.span: Read/write Object.

span.span: Returns or sets a Object value that represents the vertical alignment of the specified object.

para.span: 此属性的值可设置为其中一个常量。

span.span: The value of this property can be set to one of the constants.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Width { double get(); void set(double value); };
